original_text: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law, he took the blood of calves and of goats, with water, and scarlet wool, and hyssop, and sprinkled both the book, and all the people,
korean_text: 모세가 율법대로 모든 계명을 온 백성에게 말한 후에 송아지와 염소의 피 및 물과 붉은 양털과 우슬초를 취하여 그 두루마리와 온 백성에게 뿌리며

sentences.original_text: For when Moses had spoken every precept
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 모세가 모든 규례를 말했을 때

sentences.original_text: to all the people according to the law,
sentences.korean_translation: 율법에 따라 모든 백성에게 말한 때라

sentences.original_text: he took the blood of calves and of goats,
with water, and scarlet wool, and hyssop,
